paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: progressive sensory loss, tongue atrophy, fasciculations, dysarthria, dysphagia

individual_records.phenotype_details: progressive sensory loss affecting legs and hands, tongue atrophy, fasciculations, dysarthria, dysphagia
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 75-year-old woman developed progressive sensory loss affecting her legs and hands accompanied by mild diffuse weakness with severe asymmetric bilateral foot drops over a period of 2 years.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with TTR-FAP, characterized by severe axonal sensorimotor polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The patient exhibited severe neuropathy and bulbar weakness.
key_quotes: TTR genetic testing was performed and revealed a heterozygous mutation in exon 4 (c.379A>G resulting in p.I127V substitution, legacy nomenclature p.I107V).

patients.phenotype: rapidly progressive weakness, sensory loss, dysarthria, dysphagia

individual_records.phenotype_details: rapidly progressive painless weakness and sensory loss affecting both legs and arms, dysarthria, dysphagia
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 60-year-old man noted rapidly progressive painless weakness and sensory loss affecting both legs and arms requiring a wheelchair for mobility and accompanied by dysarthria and dysphagia over a 3-year period.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with TTR-FAP, characterized by severe axonal sensorimotor polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had a family history of ALS.
key_quotes: TTR genetic testing was performed and revealed a heterozygous mutation in exon 2 (c.148G>A resulting in p.V50M substitution, legacy nomenclature p.V30M).

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
